DelliDRACCard.description: An instance of DelliDRACCard will have data specific to the Integrated Dell Remote Access Controller (iDRAC) in the managed system.
DelliDRACCard.longDescription: An instance of DelliDRACCard will have data specific to the Integrated Dell Remote Access Controller (iDRAC) in the managed system.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

IPMIVersion.description: A string containing the IPMI Version.
IPMIVersion.longDescription: A string containing the IPMI Version.

LastSystemInventoryTime.description: This property provides the last time System Inventory Collection On Reboot(CSIOR) was performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastSystemInventoryTime.longDescription: This property provides the last time System Inventory Collection On Reboot(CSIOR) was performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

LastUpdateTime.description: This property provides the last time the data was updaed. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastUpdateTime.longDescription: This property provides the last time the data was updaed. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

URLString.description: A string containing the URL for the iDRAC Web GUI.
URLString.longDescription: A string containing the URL for the iDRAC Web GUI.

title: #DelliDRACCard.v1_1_0.DelliDRACCard
